mapper.insert: insert into FTMS_PLAN_RESULT (id, TESTCASE_ID, plan_id, work_no, RESULT_STATUS, FNL_TM, FST_TM, FST_OPR, FNL_OPR, CREATE_TM, EXE_NUM) values (#{planlistTestcaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{testcaseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testcaseExecuteResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{testcaseExecuteDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fstTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fstOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fnlOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update FTMS_PLAN_RESULT set TESTCASE_ID = #{testcaseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESULT_STATUS = #{testcaseExecuteResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, FNL_TM = #{testcaseExecuteDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FST_TM = #{fstTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FST_OPR = #{FST_OPR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FNL_OPR = #{fnlOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXE_NUM = #{exeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{planlistTestcaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, TESTCASE_ID, plan_id, RESULT_STATUS, FNL_TM, FST_TM, FST_OPR, FNL_OPR, EXE_NUM from FTMS_PLAN_RESULT where plan_id = #{map.planId}
select id, TESTCASE_ID, plan_id, RESULT_STATUS, FNL_TM, FST_TM, FST_OPR, FNL_OPR, EXE_NUM, WORK_NO from FTMS_PLAN_RESULT
select count(1) from FTMS_PLAN_RESULT ptr where ptr.TESTCASE_ID = #{testcaseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into FTMS_PLAN_RESULT (TESTCASE_ID, plan_id, RESULT_STATUS, CREATE_TM,EXE_NUM, CREATE_OPR, work_no ) values (#{testcaseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{testcaseExecuteResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTm}, 0, #{createOpr} ,#{workNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from FTMS_PLAN_RESULT where plan_id IN #{planid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
delete from FTMS_PLAN_RESULT where TESTCASE_ID = #{testcaseNo} and plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_ID FROM FTMS_PLAN_RESULT WHERE ID = #{planlistTestcaseId};
mapper.update: UPDATE FTMS_PLAN_RESULT SET FNL_UPDATE_TM = #{finalUpdateTime}, FNL_UPDATE_OPR = #{finalUpdatePrs} WHERE id = #{planlistTestcaseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FTMS_TESTCASE_EXE_RECORD (FPR_ID, DATE, OPR, STATUS, WORK_NO, PLAN_ID, TESTCASE_NO, OPR_TYPE) VALUES (#{fprId}, #{date}, #{opr}, #{status}, #{workNo}, #{planId}, #{testcaseNo}, #{oprType})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FTMS_TESTCASE_EXE_RECORD WHERE FPR_ID = #{planlistTsetcaseId} AND (OPR_TYPE = '0' OR OPR_TYPE is null)
mapper.update: UPDATE FTMS_PLAN_RESULT SET testcase_id = #{testCaseNo}, RESULT_STATUS = '0' WHERE id = #{planlistTestcaseId}
